reviews.review_text: I've been looking for a lipstick similar to a Dior Nude color I fell in love with.  I did not fall in love with the price or the fact that Dior tests on animals.  After many trials I found this GXVE Tragic Me Matte Lipstick and it is AWESOME! I was looking for a nude neutral with a warm undertone and this is it. There is enough colour that it doesn't disappear but it is subtle and not overpowering, great for daily wear.  I am a mature women (slight warm tone, fair, grey brown hair, brown eyes) and it just works perfect for me, could also see buying this for a teen who wants to look natural but polished. It is creamy, not dry at all.  I do think it will require reapplication during the day but it is not marketed as a long lasting formula so that's fair.  It lasted well through my pizza lunch today though!  Well done GXVE, great neutral colour, no animal cruelty and good price point.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This red matte lipstick is my new favorite, as well as my new go to when I want a bold, fierce, and jaw-dropping red lip. That being said, this lipstick has one of the smoothest formulas I have ever experienced. It applies so smoothly to my lips and truly only needs one swipe across for my personal desired red lip. Although I tend to have quite dry lips no matter what time of year it is, this matte lipstick would make you question if I was serious!   It also should be noted that the longevity of this lipstick is impressive. More specifically, I apply it in the morning and the color looks fresh even at 3 P.M. I love that I don't have to constantly reapply (even after eating and drinking) as quite frankly who often has the time or even thinks about reapplying while they're busy at work?   Finally, the packaging is also super cute and very sleek. It is also secure so I'm not worried about it popping open within my purse and making a mess. This review was collected as part of a promotion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was impressed by the intense pigmentation of this lipstick. One swipe provides full coverage with a rich, vibrant color that stays true throughout the day.  The matte finish is velvety and smooth, giving a sophisticated, polished look without drying out my lips. Whatu2019s particularly impressive is how comfortable it feel unlike many matte lipsticks, this one doesnu2019t feel heavy or cakey. Itu2019s lightweight, yet long-lasting, holding up well through eating and drinking with minimal touch-ups needed.  I also appreciate the clean beauty aspect of this lipstick. Knowing that itu2019s made without harmful ingredients makes me feel good about using it regularly. The packaging is chic and reflective of Gwen Stefaniu2019s iconic style, which adds to the overall experience.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If you're on the hunt for a matte lipstick that combines effortless application with high-impact color, the GXVE by Gwen Stefani Original Me Clean High-Performance Matte Lipstick is definitely worth checking out.  One of the standout features of this lipstick is how smoothly it glides on. The formula is incredibly creamy, making it easy to apply without any tugging or pulling. Once on, it delivers a stunning matte finish that manages to be both bold and refined.  Whatu2019s impressive is its minimal transfer. After applying, it stays put remarkably well, which is a huge plus for anyone who dislikes constant touch-ups. Pair it with a lip liner for clean, defined lines, and youu2019ve got a look that lasts through meals and drinks with little to no fuss.  I tested the shade Original Me, a deep red, and the color payoff was phenomenal. Itu2019s rich and vibrant, offering that classic, dramatic red lip look with just one swipe. The shade is versatile enough to elevate any makeup look, whether youu2019re aiming for a sophisticated evening ensemble or a striking daytime appearance.  In summary, the GXVE by Gwen Stefani Original Me Clean High-Performance Matte Lipstick lives up to its name with its clean application, impressive staying power, and gorgeous color payoff. If you're a fan of deep reds and matte finishes, this lipstick should definitely be on your radar.  This review was collected as part of a promotion.

reviews.review_text: Really love this lipstick! It lasts so long and provides an incredibly smooth and uniform look. It keeps my lips moist and doesnu2019t dry them out even after long wear. I love that it doesnu2019t settle into the cracks of my lips which sometimes happens with matte lipsticks. Definitely a go to when I want a nice bold look!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recently had the chance to try the Original Me High Performance Matte Lipstick in the shade Original Recipe, and I absolutely love it! The lipstick comes in a sleek, compact tube that's perfect for carrying in my purse or pocket. I wore it on a date night this past weekend and was thrilled with the results. The shade, Original Recipe, is a rich, versatile hue that added a bold touch to my look. I received numerous compliments throughout the evening, which was a nice bonus. One of the most impressive aspects of this lipstick is its staying power. Despite eating and drinking, it stayed put for hours without needing a touch-up. The matte finish is smooth and comfortable, avoiding the dryness often associated with matte formulas. Plus, the lipsticku2019s subtle, pleasant scent enhances the overall application experience. Overall, the Original Me High Performance Matte Lipstick exceeded my expectations and is definitely worth it!

The Original Me High Performance Matte Lipstick is a standout product the pigment and  long-lasting lip color, This lipstick is provide a high-impact matte finish, Its formula is designed to deliver a pigmentation with a single swipe, which is perfect for those who prefer a more striking lip look One of the most impressive of this lipstick is its rich, creamy texture! Unlike many matte lipsticks that can feel dry or cakey especially i have a dry lip and barely use a matte lip but this one is a life saver, the formula is so smoothly onto the lips, and give my lip a  full coverage without any uncomfortable dryness, The pigmentation is outstanding, with colors that remain true and vibrant throughout the day, highly recommend even you have a dry lips.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This GXVE matte lipstick is everything.  I'm not normally a red lipstick girly, but I do believe everyone should have a red lipstick in their possession.  I also am a sucker for matte lipsticks in general so I was really hoping I would like this product and I am so happy to report I am obsessed with it.  I would buy this in every shade.  The matte is perfection.  The lipstick is creamy and feels great to apply.  The red is gorgeous as well.  It's giving sophisticated, high-class, gorgeous and who wouldn't want to feel that way?  I also love how matte the lipstick looks in person and photos as well.  GXVE also has such cute packaging.  The black and white is unique to its brand and I love that.  I would definitely recommend this particular lipstick to everyone and when I wear it out and about you bet I will!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This beautiful matte lipstick is simply beautiful from the moment you apply it I could notice that beautiful red color, its formula is surprisingly creamy and slides flawlessly over the lips, avoiding any tightness or dryness that often accompanies matte lipsticks.  The color, Original Recipe - True Red, is a matte red that achieves the perfect balance between a vibrant tone and a classic elegance. This red is not only a striking color, but also has a depth that adapts wonderfully to a variety of skin tones, making it a universally flattering red. The pigmentation is impressive, with a single application, you get an intense and uniform color that remains intact for hours.  In terms of durability, this lipstick fulfills what was promised. Although it is matte, it does not leave an uncomfortable feeling of dryness, and resists firmly throughout the day, it is usually difficult to find a matte lipstick that does not dry out my lips, its formula also does not contain harmful ingredients, which adds a plus for those who prefer cleaner and more conscious beauty options.  Packaging is another area where GXVE stands out. The presentation is elegant and modern, with a design that reflects Gwen Stefani's style. This not only makes the product a pleasure to use, but also adds a touch of sophistication.  It is an excellent investment if you are looking for a matte red that combines high pigmentation, durability and a careful formula. It is perfect for special occasions or for when you want to stand out with a touch of confidence and style. This review was collected as part of a promotion

reviews.review_title: The formula is a little drying, great pigmentation
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The Original Me high-performance matte lipstick in shade Original Recipe is a great true red with blue undertones. I have quite a few matte lipsticks and thereu2019s a few pros and cons to this one. The pigmentation is great, no issues of color showing and as it is a standard lipstick it does transfer. I must say it might be the matte part but it was a little chalky on application. It wasnu2019t quite as smooth as I hoped it would be. I have a great skincare routine so my lips werenu2019t dry but without doing my routine I think they wouldu2019ve been with this lipstick alone. It feels like itu2019ll crack if you have dry lips, especially throughout the day. I deducted one star due to this. The formula needs a little tweaking in terms of hydration while maintaining the matte look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, notSure skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The GXVE Original Me Matte Lipstick in Original Recipe True Red has quickly become my favorite red lipstick! After trying both the liquid and satin versions, Iu2019ve found that this matte formula is the perfect match for my skin tone. The shade is a true red with just the right balance of warmth and depth, making it incredibly flattering. Unlike the liquid lipstick, which leaned a bit too orangey for my taste, this matte version gives me that classic red Iu2019ve been searching for.  The texture is smooth and velvety, gliding on effortlessly without tugging. Itu2019s buildable too, allowing me to go from a subtle wash of color to a bold, intense red depending on my mood or the occasion. Despite being matte, it doesnu2019t feel drying at all, and it wears comfortably throughout the day. I also love how long-lasting it is; it stays put for hours without smudging or fading, even after eating and drinking.  The packaging is sleek and sturdy, making it easy to take on the go for touch-ups, though I rarely need them. Overall, the GXVE Original Me Matte Lipstick in Original Recipe True Red is an absolute winner in my book. If youu2019re looking for a versatile, true red matte lipstick thatu2019s buildable and suits a variety of skin tones, this is the one to get. Iu2019m so glad I added it to my collection!

reviews.review_title: One of the best matte formulas out there!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Matte lipsticks are not something I reach for very often because they tend to dry my lips and feel heavy or uncomfortable on my lips; but Iu2019m so surprised at how different this matte formula from GXVE is! These lipsticks are highly pigmented so you have to be careful with them when applying it but it looks so stunning once itu2019s on, itu2019s not transfer proof completely but it has a minimal amount of transfer compared to other matte formulas on the market; it not drying on the lips and I find that itu2019s very lightweight and feels comfortable as well, itu2019s also very long lasting and wears off very evenly, I donu2019t see that weird rim around my lips that youu2019d see with other lipsticks; out of all my lipsticks Iu2019d say this one has one of the best and most comfortable matte formulas and now I feel like I need more shades! The packaging is super cute and original and I love how nice and aesthetic it looks on my vanity! This shade I find that looks very flattering on my neutral undertone and itu2019s going to look so beautiful now that weu2019re getting into the fall months with more u201ctoastyu201d kind of looks; absolutely love it!

reviews.review_title: Original Me High Performance Matte Lipstick
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The GXVE Original Me High Performance Matte Lipstick is a standout product in the realm of matte lipsticks. From the moment you twist up the sleek bullet, the luxurious texture is evident. The formula glides on smoothly, delivering an intense, full-coverage color payoff with just one swipe. What sets this lipstick apart is its comfortable wearu2014itu2019s lightweight and non-drying, a rarity for matte finishes. The color stays true throughout the day, resisting feathering and fading, even after hours of wear.  The shade range is versatile, offering everything from classic reds to modern nudes, catering to a variety of skin tones and preferences. The pigmentation is rich and vibrant, ensuring your lips make a statement. Additionally, the lipstick has a soft, velvety finish that feels plush on the lips, yet it manages to avoid the chalky look that some matte lipsticks can have.   For those who value ethical beauty, GXVEu2019s commitment to being cruelty-free and vegan adds to the appeal. Whether you're heading to a meeting or a night out, this lipstick provides a polished look that lasts. The packaging, with its edgy, chic design, mirrors the quality of the product inside. Overall, the GXVE Original Me High Performance Matte Lipstick is an excellent choice for anyone seeking a bold, comfortable, and long-lasting matte lip.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: As someone whou2019s been immersed in the beauty and skincare world for over three years, Iu2019ve tried countless lipsticks, from drugstore gems to luxury splurges. But the GXVE BY GWEN STEFANI Original Me High-Performance Matte Lipstick in shade Original Recipe is a standout that deserves your attention.  This lipstick is for the bold, the confident, and the unapologetically glamorous. If youu2019re someone who loves to make a statement with your lips, Original Recipe is your go-to shade. Itu2019s a classic, true red that exudes Gwen Stefaniu2019s iconic styleu2014think old Hollywood glamour meets modern-day rockstar.  What sets this lipstick apart is its luxurious, high-performance formula. The velvety-matte finish is to die for. Itu2019s intensely pigmented, delivering rich, vibrant color in just one swipe. And unlike some matte lipsticks that can feel drying, this one glides on smoothly and feels comfortable all day long. No fading, no featheringu2014just pure, bold color that stays put from morning to night.  I also love that this lipstick is vegan, cruelty-free, and clean. Itu2019s rare to find a product that combines such high performance with a commitment to ethical beauty. And the packaging? GXVE BY GWEN STEFANI doesnu2019t disappoint. The outer boxes are 100% recyclable, and the primary containers are made with sustainable materials, including 30% or higher post-consumer recycled plastic or glass. Itu2019s beauty with a conscience.  Applying this lipstick is a dream. Start at the center of your lips and work your way toward the outer corners. The pointed tip makes it easy to perfect your pout, even without a lip liner. And letu2019s be honest, the confidence boost that comes with wearing a red this powerful is undeniable.  In my experience, Original Recipe is not just a lipstick; itu2019s a statement. Whether youu2019re dressing up for a night out or adding a touch of glam to your everyday look, this lipstick will make you feel like youu2019re ready to conquer the world. Itu2019s become a staple in my makeup collectio

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As a beauty, skincare, and makeup enthusiast, I have to say I honestly love this matte lipstick so much! After years of lip gloss (hello fellow millennials in the era of the Victoriau2019s Secret and juicy tubes by Lancu00f4me craze) and matte liquid lipsticks (which I still love!) I usually prefer satin finishes in my lipsticks so I wasnu2019t sure what to expect of this but it made me feel like Taylor swift! I love the pigmentation of this lipstick and how it lasts all day, even through coffee and meals! Itu2019s beautiful and high quality and the perfect matte red for me! reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The remarkable shade of red in the GXVE Original Me High Performance Matte Lipstick is simply breathtaking! Gwen's expertise in selecting the perfect reds shines through in this product. And let's not forget about the stylish packaging - it's incredibly sleek, chic, and undoubtedly Instagram-worthy. Pulling these lipsticks out of my purse feels like unveiling little tubes of pure luxury.  The GXVE Original Me High Performance Matte Lipstick promises a full pigment formula with a light, weightless texture and an impressively long-lasting finish. Say farewell to frequent touch-ups and welcome long-lasting fabulousness!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I am a makeup enthusiast but I am sure this lipstick is the most complete one I have used. It provides both moisture as well as longevity. Most importantly, it feels good on my lips. I love this formula. I usually find mattes and long wear lipsticks uncomfortable and too dry usually. I also hate how they wear off unevenly. But this one feels so velvety, blots well and fades naturally. I did not find it too drying on my lips. I have had it on 8 hours eating and drink. I tend to apply more than one layer to get some more wear out of it. This particular shade looks good on every kinds of skin tones. There is no smell and it is not sticky or impossible to get off. It has wonderful pigment and doesnu2019t smudge. The price point is incredible too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: As a long time Gwen Stefani fan, I was eager to try this lipstick and it has truly exceeded my expectations! The shade of red is simply breathtaking, vibrant and striking yet versatile enough for any occasion. One of the standout features of this lipstick is how smoothly it glides on. The formula is incredibly creamy, making application effortless and ensuring an even, flawless finish. I was also pleasantly surprised by the subtle vanilla scent which adds another touch of luxury without being overpowering.  Given my sensory sensitivities finding a lipstick that doesnu2019t feel heavy or suffocating is crucial. This formula is light and comfortable, allowing me to wear it for extended periods without any discomfort. I wore it for six hours during a hot day and it held up remarkably well with only a few minor touch-ups. The longevity is impressive, and it doesnu2019t require constant reapplication which is a huge plus.   Its beautiful shade, smooth application, pleasant scent and long lasting wear make it a must have. I highly recommend it to anyone looking for a high quality matte lipstick that combines style and comfort!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This GXVE Original Me High Performance (Matte Lipstick)   is undoubtedly the best matte lipstick I've ever used! The vibrant color with matte finish is long wearing. reviews.review_text: I got the Original Recipe Red Lipstick and it comes in a classic, elegant tube with a secure closure. The pigmentation of this lipstick is outstanding. reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful long wearing shades that feel comfortable on the lip! Being an esthetician for over 13 years with a background in makeup artistry and high-end/professional retail environments I have seen and used my fair share of lipsticks. I love the vision behind the Gxve line as well as the clean, vegan formulas. That said I think the products should speak for themselves in terms of quality and usability and these really do! I've tried three different Gxve lipstick formulas and the original me matte lipsticks are hands down my favorite. I have shades original recipe and tragic me. They are both beautiful shades packaged in a classic twist up bullet style lipstick that are easy to apply and are comfortable on the lips. You're going to feel something is there once you apply it however it's not going to feel heavy or terribly dry like some matte lipsticks can. To be honest after applying shade tragic me I did forget I had lipstick on and accidentally rubbed some of it off because I haven't been wearing much lipstick as of late. If anything I think that speaks to it's comfortability that I forgot it was there. The formula is not transfer proof although the pigment does grip the lips for a long lasting result. I ate and drank without much difficulty or experiencing any smudging/general messiness. The formula did not feather or bleed at all during or after application. This is just an overall good matte bullet lip and for that reason I would recommend it for daily use or special events as long as you don't mind having to toss it in your bag and the need for occasional reapplication. reviews.review_text: Hello! My name is Toni & Iu2019ve been a licensed cosmetologist for nearly a decade. Color theory is a must in my profession, and red is my signature color. Gxve has nearly perfected a matte, sultry, bright red in the Original Recipe.  The formula is dry for my taste. True to the label, this is a high-performance formula. However, I prefer a more comfortable-wearing formula. Itu2019s insanely pigmented, one swipe full blown opaque color, it really doesnu2019t take much to fill in the lips! The longevity is extremely impressive as well. This lipstick lasted on my lips my entire work shift. I only had to touch up a little after my lunch, but other than thatu2019s this stuff STAY PUT!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: GXVE Original Me High Performance Matte Lipstick is a standout product that effortlessly captures the timeless elegance of Gwen Stefani's classic look. As a makeup artist with over 30 years of experience, I have witnessed the evolution of matte lipsticks, and GXVE truly stands out. One of the most impressive features is its remarkable stay power, reminiscent of other high-end matte formulations, but without the notorious drying effect for me. This lipstick not only withstands the test of time but also survives meals with an impressive stain that remains intact, even after sipping from a glass. It's perfect for those who crave a long-lasting, vibrant lip color without the hassle of constant touch-ups. Being a devoted fan of the matte trend, I appreciate how the industry has evolved in terms of color selection, durability, and versatility. GXVE's commitment to delivering on all these fronts is commendable. The brand has managed to strike the perfect balance by creating a lipstick that applies slightly creamy, ensuring a smooth glide over the lips, but ultimately sets a flawless matte fin

reviews.review_title: Beautiful and Less Drying Than Most Mattes
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Let me preface my review by saying that I rarely wear matte lipstick because my thin little lips need a glossy color to have any semblance of plumpness. That said, I adore the GXVE Original Me High Performance Matte Lipstick in Original Recipe. The blue-red shade looks beautiful with my cool-toned skin, and I consider this a power color that everyone should own at least once in their life. This is sexy, sexy, sexy, and the pigmentation is unmatched. On my mature lips, it feathered into the lines around my mouth when I wore it without lip liner, but it remained in place with lip liner for several hours. I cannot comment on its overall longevity because when it started to feel dry, I applied gloss on top of it. I also tried Tragic Me (a neutral with minimal pink undertones). It looks very brown on my lips, and although I didnu2019t care for the shade, the formula performed identically to its bold red sister in every way. In another (i.e., younger) life, Iu2019d snap up 80u2019s Me in a heartbeat, so perhaps Iu2019ll pick up Stefaniu2019s Bubble Pop Electric High-Shine Lip Gloss in Electric Pansy and take it for a spin. 4 stars.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Hello everyone! My name is Lydia, I am an influencer and content creator. I was really excited to try this matte lipstick from GXVE. This is a high-performance lipstick with high color payoff and a matte finish. I really like the shades i got and that they did not dry out my lips. I got the beautiful shades Tragic Me and Original Recipe. Both are great every day shades to wear. It smoothly applies on, is pigmented, lasts most for many hours, and is great to use with the lip liner. I just carry it my purse and apply more when i feel i need to reapply. Tragic Me has been one of my favorite lipstick to use to school Original Recipe, the beautiful red shade is perfect for date night or family nights. I want to buy 0u013athe other shades. I highly recommend this lipstick.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brunette hair, Porcelain skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As someone who enjoys experimenting with different lipsticks, the GXVE Original Me High Performance Matte Lipstick in the shade Original Recipe has become a standout in my collection. The color Original Recipe is a bold and striking red that instantly elevates any makeup look, making a statement without being overpowering.  What sets this lipstick apart is its high-performance matte formula. Upon application, it glides on smoothly, creating a velvety finish that feels weightless on the lips. The pigmentation is intense, delivering a vibrant and true-to-color result in just one swipe. I appreciate that it doesn't dry out my lips, maintaining a comfortable feel throughout the day.  The longevity of this matte lipstick is impressive; it stays intact for extended periods, resisting smudging and fading. I can confidently go about my day without constant touch-ups, making it a reliable choice for busy schedules.  The sleek packaging adds a touch of sophistication to the product, and the click-close mechanism ensures it stays secure in my purse without any mess. What's even more commendable is that it's cruelty-free and vegan, aligning with my values as a conscious consumer.  In conclusion, the GXVE Original Me High Performance Matte Lipstick in Original Recipe combines a striking color, comfortable matte formula, and long-lasting wear, making it a standout choice for those seeking a reliable and bold lipstick for various occasions.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Lipstick is probably the most personal beauty product. The reason I would say it's considered to be personal is because your lips are the center of attention and they tell a story. There are an array of lipsticks and I had the honor to try GXVE's Anaheim Shine-High Performance Lipstick. I wore 4 colors- Original Recipe with 2 different formulas (Satin and Matte) The next 2 colors were Screen My Phone Calls (Satin) and finally Tragic Me which is a (matte) formula. These lipsticks gave off great color payoff, they did not smudge and were easy to apply to the lips. They are also comfortable and wearable throughout the day. Honestly, the Original Recipe feels and looks more like a matte formula than satin. The lipstick still gives off a matte look but it's ultimately soft and comfortable on the lips. It's great that the lipsticks did not move or transfer. I would wear these shades again and try some more!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was excited to see GXVE expand her range of lip colors, across all the different lines. While my dry-leaning lips and I prefer a satin finish, I was very impressed with her liquid lipstick and her matte lipstick collections (both of which I previously received as gratis) and was excited to try some of her new shades. I went with the shade Old School Me, and am sharing my honest and authentic opinion, as a Sephora Beauty Insider Community Ambassador.   WHAT I LIKE: * Lightweight formula * Easy to apply - glides on effortlessly * Hydrating for a matte lipstick - there's some dryness but it's mild * Does not bleed or feather * Wears comfortably - wears gently and softly on lips - despite there being a smidge of dryness, my lips don't feel tight or dried out by the end of the day * Long wearing with minimal transfer * Nicely pigmented color; richly saturated * Gives a nice stain to the lips as the color wears down * Fun packaging design  AREA(S) FOR IMPROVEMENT: * Wouldn't mind a little more heft in the packaging * Would like to see more shades available, including a MLBB or deeper rosewood shade * I tend to prefer lipsticks with a neutral to neutral-to-cool undertone and the GXVE lipsticks fit that category, but it would be nice to see some shades with warmer undertones as well.  FYI / OTHER THOUGHTS: * The shade Old School Me is described as a rich berry red. There's definitely more of a burgundy bent to this shade than with Original Recipe; it adds a nice depth to my naturally pigmented lips. May be an easier way to wear a red lipstick for those newer to reds. * I've read that this lipstick has a scent but I don't detect any scent at all   BUY, BUY, BUY ud83dudecd or BYE-BYE ud83dudc4b?: * These are one of the more comfortable matte lipsticks out there and if GXVE releases more shades, it's a BUY for me.

reviews.review_text: What a great lipstick.  I tend to shy away from bold colors because my lips are so thin.  But 80u2019s me just called my name and I had to try it.  It glides on smooth and the pigment is great.  Not much transfer when I kissed my arm.  With 8Ou2019s me I used Urban Decay JILTED lip pencil. This pencil matched this color spot on.  As I didnu2019t see on in the GXVE line. Lips looked amazing for about three hours until I ate something.  Not much came off but it definitely needed freshening up.  I didnu2019t want to start over or reapply so I put on some gloss and it made my lips pop again with a beautiful shine.  I love the matte look but the glossy look is just as beautiful and makes it last longer. Love the tube case also!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is the one!  Wish list of a lipstick. Color is amazing, saturated, long lasting and lovely texture, not drying like many other matte lipsticks. It is not what is shown on the web but more of a pink fuschia that goes with my medium,golden skin tone.  The price point is just right.  LOVE IT! (and I love her eyeshadow as well- another review).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

She really did deliver, not only with formula, but the color is just amazing. I bought this color specifically for a concert I'm going to. The first time I wore it to try is durability after eating, I had diner and I must say... there was some fade to it, but not to the point where your lips are bare. You can easily continue your day without retouching if needed.   Regarding the formula, it is matte, but not to the point where your lips feel dry. It moisturizes the lips quite a bit!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_title: Easy to wear, classic Gwen Stefani red
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am sharing my honest and authentic opinion as a Sephora Beauty Insider Community Ambassador. Matte lipsticks tend to scare me because of their drying effect and I've tended to steer clear of them as my already dry-leaning lips don't need to be more dry. Recent matte lipstick formulations, however, have thankfully been less drying without sacrificing the long wear that matte lipsticks are known for, and that's what I was hoping for when I received this matte lipstick as gratis.  The red of the Original Recipe shade is a beautiful, classic red. This beauty goes on effortlessly for a matte or any formula for that matter. It's smooth, does not pull or tug as it glides across the lips and wears comfortably. This matte formulation is a lovely middle ground between the liquid and satin lipsticks from the brand. The payoff is strong with this matte, though not as strong as her liquid lipstick, and lasted a good while, even through taking my mask on and off throughout the day. The red is bold and is stunning when paired with the neutral and very understated shadows of The Simple Life Quad and the Spiderwebs gel liner for a signature Gwen Stefani look. Reds are not something I reach for but I would happily use the reds in the GXVE collection - they seem to flatter many complexions and skin tones.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: To start off, 80's Me, is such a cool name to give a lipstick shade, since I love 80s music! Haha. This color is beautiful and is a mixture of a plum-Fuschia color. In certain lighting, it looks like magenta, and then in darker lighting, it looks more plum/purple. I do wish that it was less transferrable, but it is a creamy matte lipstick though. I also wish that it was more pink than purple looking. Overall I give it 4 stars!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin

Has a pleasant smell to it. And it stayed on for quite awhile too, love that! Removal was easy with my makeup remover (I use a micellar water)  Side note: REALLY cute packaging!  Recommend this highly!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Hi, I am a Sephora Beauty Insider Community Ambassador!  This goes on so smooth. I like how it feels. It really gives a great red lip without bleeding and lasts through a meal! I will definitely buy this in other shades!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin

Thereu2019s no way to sugar coat the fact that this smells and tastes like the stinkiest drugstore lipsticks. Not a fan of Maybelline, Lu2019Oreal, or Rimmel stenches? Avoid this brands lipsticks.   The formula is quite nice, but that odor is nauseating making it unwearable for me.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Old School Me - rich berry red

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Old School Me - rich berry red
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this in the shade Old School Me. I thought it would be a deep red but it isnu2019t.   Packaging is ok, doesnu2019t scream cheap but doesnu2019t feel luxurious or high end either.   Color is an amazingly beautiful, vibrant magenta red. Brighter than it looks in the photo and really brightens up the complexion. I donu2019t think I have any lip colors quite like it and I have two whole boxes of lipsticks.  Cons: Smells like cheap drugstore lipstick.  Formula is VERY dry to apply and requires multiple applications. But it doesnu2019t feel dry on the lips. Itu2019s just the drag during application.   Transfers easily but leaves a very good stain so it feels long wearing. My micellar water doesnu2019t completely remove the base stain left behind.   Very very conflicted feelings about this lipstick. I love the color so much, and it wore well for the short time I had it on. But the dryness during application drags my lips SO much, and packaging can really be better at this price point. If I didnu2019t receive a lot of free lipsticks with my work, itu2019s a lipstick I would likely consider repurchasing for the color and stain.

simply so good! like paint, immediately dries on lips

reviews.review_text: I tried the shade Loveable Me, which is a Peachy Brown shade. This lipstick was not only opaque but also comfortable to wear. I hope that they start selling them soon because this is a very innovative idea.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is the second lipstick that I have had the privilege of using and  still very impressed! The first was the satin version of Anaheim Shine (which is gorgeous!) Now I have a matte version of the shade 80's Me. When I first opened it I thought whoa! That's bright and bold! It is. But it's beautiful and unique. It's not really a hot pink since it has a slight lavender color to it. I have fair-slightly medium neutral color skin tone with light blonde hair and it does look good with my complextion. It would look amazing on deeper skin tones as well. It's very comfortable. Long-lasting but non drying. Has a coconut scent. Love it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin

I used my finger to apply it on my lips and itu2019s very pretty, but I will have to figure out a new container for it so it may not get much use unfortunately.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My review is for the shade Tragic Me, which I noticed is practically a spot on shade match to my CT Lip Cheat in Pillow Talk. Perfect nude shade for my complexion!  The formula itself is matte, which does mean that upon application, thereu2019s a bit of an appearance of lip lines on my 30+ natural lips. This is to be expected of a matte lipstick. However! What surprised me is that it doesnu2019t have the same drying sensation that many other matte lipsticks have. In fact, I forgot I was wearing it - the true marker of a comfortable lip product!  I will point out that the packaging itself isnu2019t necessarily as lux as I expected. It feels pretty lightweight, and most surprisingly, it arrived with the lipstick itself partially detached from the base. Initially I thought it might be a refillable lipstick, but now that I know that is not the case - I am quite surprised. Thankfully, once I pushed it down, it seems that it is staying in place. Itu2019s something to note, but I donu2019t think it would stop me from picking up another (preferably in the VIB sale, where the price would better match the packaging).

reviews.review_title: Beautiful blue-red, but transfers a lot
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am sharing my honest and authentic opinion, as a Sephora Beauty Insider Community Ambassador.  Pros: - really beautiful blue-toned red. I gravitated towards this one when I first saw the collection - has that weightless feel, as a matte lipstick should! Love that I canu2019t feel it on my lips at all! - can apply it to the lips fully or wear as a blotted lip (see 2nd photo for swatches of both versions). If worn as a blotted lip, try to work it in fast, as it starts to settle quickly - can be worn as a blush! I actually love it as a blush, since it gives a subtle flush thanks to the violet-fuchsia colour it takes on when blending it in. I used setting spray and it didnu2019t transfer onto my mask when I wore it on my cheeks, yaaaay!  Cons: - transfers a lot onto cups/food - any lettuce wraps or bread will be no bueno unless you want to see it all over what youu2019re eating - has a lived-in look after eating, which is okay. Faded somewhat evenly, but I would consider touching up a bit - transfers even when worn as a blotted lip i.e. even when using very little pigment - overall, knocking off a star because it transfers more than I would like for a matte lipstick (in my experience, it transfers more than the GXVE satin lipstick, which definitely surprised me)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I originally purchased the satin version and returned it. I have needed to replace my old mac Russian Red for awhile, so I picked up this one to try. It is a beautiful cool red that is more semi matte. I applied with Sephora Pro lip brush to stain the lips and blend the edges. Then a single swipe to intensify the colour!  No lip liner necessary as It does not bleed and it is long lasting. And it is a clean product; whatu2019s not to love?!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love a red lip and this formula delivers a huge pigmented pay off with lasting results. In the past, choosing only cruelty-free and vegan makeup meant sacrificing quality, but that's definitely not the case with this matte lipstick. It's a great start and I look forward to more high quality products that are clean, cruelty-free and vegan with this kind of pay off.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I found this to perform better than expected, for a variety of reasons. It was easy to apply directly from the tube with fine point on product. If you are looking to save time (rather than applying with a brush), this was a breeze. It also feels quite hydrating, a characteristic I expect from a balmier product. In addition, it left a subtle shine on my lips, which might not be what a matte-seeker is expecting, so it is worth noting. After applying this early in the morning, a mirror check a couple of hours later revealed everything still in place. It did transfer to my coffee mug, but I would expect that to happen with just about any traditional bullet lipstick formula. By the end of the day, I had reapplied a handful of times after eating/drinking, and found it had left a pretty stain on my lips. Perfect to cover with gloss! Finally, the shade is quite flattering on a variety of skin tones. I would love to see this offered in a nude, which I would be more likely to wear. However, for a red, it wears so comfortably that it *almost* feels natural.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Perfect red matte. Stays on all day very little transfer.  Love that it doesnu2019t even feel like Iu2019m wearing lipstick

reviews.review_title: Broken but moist for a matte
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was so excited to try this. It came in the mail so I opened it immediately. As soon as I picked up the package I could feel something rattle inside. Opened the lipstick only to have the lipstick portion plop onto my lap and the inner casing fall to the floor. I just sat there holding the lid and base of the container, staring at the micro-bullet of a lipstick laying on my lap. All that packaging for such a SMALL amount of productu2026 Boo. Well , itu2019s here so I grab my lip brush and tested the product. I do love the color and am a bit surprised at how moist it actually feels for a matte. Iu2019ll probably swap it out for a new one but any other problems and Iu2019m done.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am sharing my honest and authentic opinion, as a Sephora Beauty Insider Community Ambassador.  Out of the three lipsticks in her line, this one seemed to be the most drying on the lips even with a lip balm underneath.  It didnu2019t really glide on like the satin and liquid lip.  It also transferred a bit when wearing it (even when paired with Pat McGrath Blood Lust lipliner).  On the plus side, it is a very muted red tone color with a stain like appearance which would be the perfect bridal red if it was a little more hydrating.  Like the liquid and satin lipstick, this one has a scent to it that could be off putting for some.  I do like the packaging and design for the lipstick cover but know some may feel it cheap because it is made of plastic and doesnu2019t have weight to it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely loved everything about it!!! The formula was amazing! It felt creamy after applying but had a matte-ish finish! It didnu2019t budge and I didnu2019t have to reapply

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am a red lipstick LOVER. I have so many in my collection, I was really trying to convince myself I didn't need another one, but then I visited Sephora and tested this colour out and was like crap, I guess I have to get it. It's THE PERFECT shade of blue-red. There is zero yellow cast that you sometimes get with other blue-reds. It's not too bright, not too dark. It's just right. I can absolutely see this being an iconic red down the line, it is just so good.  The colour pay off is fantastic. It feels so comfortable on the lips. It covers the butt hole (shout out to my Safiya lovers), and it applies super well with only a little tug on un-moisturized lips.  My ONLY ehhh about it is the scent. It's not overly scented AT ALL, but the scent itself isn't incredibly appealing to me. It kinda has a weird, not very sweet vanilla sugar cookie type smell to it that I could really do without. But it's not enough to knock this down to a 4 stars, that's for sure.  Honestly, I may never wear another red again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Long-lasting, beautiful red color, and smells delicious!

reviews.review_title: This is amazing! Favorite matte bullet lipstick!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am sharing my honest and authentic opinion as a Sephora Beauty Insider Community Ambassador. I was sent this palette from @TeamBIC and GXVE, Thank you so much!  For reference, I am 44 years old and have wrinkly aging lips.  PROS: - I love that all the collection come in clean, modern, chic looking recycled cardboard boxes that have a gorgeous design inside. - It is a clean at Sephora brand, cruelty free, vegan, and with recyclable packaging. - The packaging is so beautiful! I find it elegant and chic. It is not too light but not heavy either. It closes with a click, not magnetic. - It is a matte formula, that feels velvety and comfortable on the lips. It was not drying, it looked more and more matte as time went by. - It is long lasting and it fades in a very natural way, leaving a beautiful stain on the lips. - You can blot it for a more natural shade, if you donu2019t like intense red lips.  - It is pigmented but I get better color payoff with two swipes than one. - It doesnu2019t bleed into lip lines and wrinkles. - I find it rightly priced for the quality. CONS: - It is NOT transfer-free but the brand doesnu2019t claim that either. - It is a strongly scented lipstick. I donu2019t mind perfumed formulas, in fact I like them, but I find this one a little too overwhelming for my liking, but I like the lipstick performance so much that this doesnu2019t change my rating of the product. But if you donu2019t like scented formulas, stay away from this one. - I will need to use a lip liner for precision now on because I lost the pointy shape of the bullet. I cannot apply it directly on the lips and get clean lines now.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: My husband randomly bought me this because he is in love with Gwen Stefani, and know I love a red lipstick. I had low expectations because I have tried so many different lipsticks in my days, and associate lipsticks that come in a twist-tube as lipsticks that need a lip liner, smudge, and need constant baby sitting/reapplication. I probably wouldnu2019t have even given it a chance, but since my husband gave it to me, wore it out that night. I was SHOCKED by how good the formula was! It goes on smooth, smells great, has a beautiful color, andu2014most importantlyu2014stays where it ought to! I have never used a lipstick like this. It is matte and long-wearing like liquid-to-matte lipsticks, but feels less dry and is nicer to wear. The lipstick never ended up on my teeth, had minimal transfer, and I actually had to use make up remover to take it off! Really nice product. Also, the color is great (not as warm of a tone as I typically wear, but very pretty), and the packaging is quality. Did NOT expect to give this five stars!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: love this lipstick, very comfortable and lasts all day. not totally transfer proof but really does a great job for a tube. doesn't feel dry and doesn't gunk up on your lips.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Really great matte formula. Very comfortable and non-drying. Also lasts well through meals. Takes a couple of coats for full coverage but that also helps controlled application. Impressive for a new brand

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Luv it luv it!!!! Stays on forever eating  drinking whatever!!! Color is fantastic I get compliments all the time!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Greu00e2t colour and amazing texture. Stays very well  I love a red lip, and this one does a great  job

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Perfect!  Love a great red matte.  Staying power.  Received many compliments.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin

It was slightly orangey when I applied to my lips, but the next time I put a little powder to neutralize the pink in my lips and it came out more solid red. The packaging is sleek and modern. Overall, a solid lipstick.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin

Perfect i would say universal red that will suit many skin tones. Can't wait to see what other shades brand will launch. Super excited! Now we all can rock beautiful red lip like Gwen!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, gray hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin

reviews.review_title: uhm Hello Gwen you did your thing

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
